input.sentences: my brother 's band was warming up for their first gig .
my brother readied his guitar in anticipation .
they played a few songs and were a hit sensation for the fans .
i bugged my brother into getting a picture with the pianist .
and we managed to make it happen !
output.sentences: Paul tested his mic before the big gig.
Dan definitely stole the show on his keyboard though.
Some people even asked him for a photo and autograph after the show.
